events.message: We have received the application of Jane Doe for the Software Engineer position and will start the review process shortly.
Jane Doe's profile has been categorised under Engineering as she has relevant software development experience.
Recruiter Michael Smith has been assigned to handle Jane Doe's application and coordinate the next steps.
The initial screening call with Jane Doe went well; she demonstrated strong knowledge in required software engineering principles.
Jane responded promptly and positively to our proposed technical interview schedule, confirming her availability next week.
The technical interview with Jane has been scheduled for May 7th, and the interview panel is prepared with relevant questions.
Jane completed the technical interview successfully, showcasing advanced problem-solving skills and coding expertise.
Following the successful technical round, Jane's HR interview has been scheduled for May 10th to discuss cultural fit and benefits.
Jane's HR interview went smoothly; she expressed strong alignment with company values and career goals.
An offer has been proposed to Jane Doe, detailing the position, salary package, and other relevant employment terms.
We received positive feedback from Jane expressing enthusiasm about the offer and eagerness to join our engineering team.
Jane Doe officially accepted the employment offer and confirmed her start date as June 1st.
Jane began her onboarding process with orientation sessions and initial setup for her engineer role.
The hiring process for Jane Doe has been successfully closed; she is now an active member of the engineering department.
